problem.markdown:
Which of the following assumptions can be made while analyzing problems?
[x] Air is a homogeneous fluid. [x] The air remains gaseous in near ambient temperatures. [x] It can be assumed to be an ideal gas because it does not seem to interact chemically with other gases.
problem.p: Which of the following assumptions can be made while analyzing problems?

checkboxgroup.choice: The air remains gaseous in near ambient temperatures.
It can be assumed to be an ideal gas because it does not seem to interact chemically with other gases.
